data.text: Azɔ mele ha dzi ge na nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ tso
Edzobo eme heɖe kpewo le eme,
“Azɔ, Yerusalem ŋutsuwo kple Yuda ŋutsuwo,
Nu ka wòle be mawɔ na nye waingble la
Azɔ magblɔ nu si wɔ ge mala
Mawɔe wòazu gbegbe,
Israel ƒe aƒee nye Yehowa,
Baba na mi ame siwo le xɔ tsiam ɖe xɔ nu,
Ale Yehowa, Dziƒoʋakɔwo ƒe Aƒetɔ la,
Woakpɔ wain adzafi ɖeka
Baba na mi, ame siwo fɔna fɔŋli henɔa ho ʋlim
Kasaŋkuwo kple saŋkuwo ɖina
Eya ta nye amewo ayi ɖe aboyome le nugɔmemasemase ta;
Eya ta nuɖuɖu le yɔdo dzrom vevie,
Ale woaɖiɖi ame ɖe anyi,
Ke woado Yehowa,
Ekema alẽwo aɖu gbe abe woawo ŋutɔ
Baba na ame siwo tsɔ beble
ame siwo gblɔna be “Mawu newɔ kaba.
Baba na ame siwo yɔ vɔ̃ be nyui,
Baba na ame siwo bua wo ɖokuiwo nunyalawoe,
Baba na ame siwo nye kalẽawo le wain gã nono me,
ame siwo xɔa zãnu, eye wotsoa afia ŋkunɔ na agɔdzelawo;
Eya ta abe ale si dzo ƒe aɖe fiaa bee,
Eya ta Yehowa ƒe dziku bi ɖe eƒe amewo ŋu.
Ekɔ aflaga dzi na didiƒe dukɔwo, eye wòlia aku na
Ɖeɖi mete wo dometɔ aɖeke ŋu
Woƒe datiwo le ɖaɖam,
Woƒe gbeɖeɖe le abe dzata tɔ ene,
Gbe ma gbe la, woaɖe gbe ɖe edzi abe atsiaƒu ene.
